comments.html: So nice to hear someone appreciates my pointers. Thank you!
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: Thank you Ivan, that one realy made me laugh. I had to argue against my manager wanting to inject some unknowly sourced manually extracted Excel data into our DB a few weeks ago, and I faced the exact same excuses :-) Btw, reading you regularly through RSS, great content. I read an IP journal just yesterday evening about the history of ethernet thanks to you. Cheers!
comments.name: Bob
